roleset.name: go beyond

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: That means it 's unlikely the company will surpass last year 's $ 4.9 billion full - year profit , even though net for the first nine months was up 1.9 % to $ 3.52 billion on revenue of $ 95.57 billion .

propbank.arg: last year 's $ 4.9 billion full - year profit

example.name: with secondary predication
example.text: Conner Peripherals Inc. , which has a near - monopoly on a key part used in many portable computers , is on target to surpass Compaq Computer Corp. as the fastest - growing start - up manufacturing firm in U.S. business history .

propbank.arg: Conner Peripherals Inc. , which has a near - monopoly on a key part used in many portable computers
as the fastest - growing start - up manufacturing firm in U.S. business history

roleset.note: SURPASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'surpass' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No comparison. VN class exceed-90. (from surpass.01-v)
